column1: WARN_IF(OR(HAS_HISTORY_OF_SPECIFIC_CONDITION_WITH_ICD_TITLE_X[Obstruction of large intestine], HAS_HISTORY_OF_SPECIFIC_CONDITION_WITH_ICD_TITLE_X[Diseases of large intestine], HAS_HISTORY_OF_SPECIFIC_CONDITION_WITH_ICD_TITLE_X[Diseases of small intestine], HAS_HISTORY_OF_SPECIFIC_CONDITION_WITH_ICD_TITLE_X[Inflammatory bowel diseases]))

WARN_IF(OR(HAS_SEVERE_CONCOMITANT_CONDITION, HAS_HISTORY_OF_MYOCARDIAL_INFARCT_WITHIN_X_MONTHS[3], HAS_HISTORY_OF_SPECIFIC_CONDITION_WITH_ICD_TITLE_X_WITHIN_Y_MONTHS[Transient ischaemic attack, 3], HAS_HISTORY_OF_SPECIFIC_CONDITION_WITH_ICD_TITLE_X_WITHIN_Y_MONTHS[Acute ischaemic heart disease, 3], HAS_HISTORY_OF_SPECIFIC_CONDITION_WITH_ICD_TITLE_X_WITHIN_Y_MONTHS[Cerebrovascular diseases, 3], HAS_HISTORY_OF_SPECIFIC_CONDITION_WITH_ICD_TITLE_X_WITHIN_Y_MONTHS[Conduction disorders, 3], HAS_HISTORY_OF_SPECIFIC_CONDITION_WITH_ICD_TITLE_X_WITHIN_Y_MONTHS[Diseases of coronary artery, 3]))
WARN_IF(HAS_HISTORY_OF_SECOND_MALIGNANCY_WITHIN_X_YEARS_IGNORING_DOID_TERMS_Y[3, basal cell carcinoma;skin squamous cell carcinoma])

AND(OR(HAS_CYTOLOGICAL_DOCUMENTATION_OF_TUMOR_TYPE, HAS_HISTOLOGICAL_DOCUMENTATION_OF_TUMOR_TYPE), OR(AND(OR(HAS_LOCALLY_ADVANCED_CANCER, HAS_RECURRENT_CANCER), HAS_ANY_STAGE_X[IIIB;IIIC], IS_NOT_ELIGIBLE_FOR_TREATMENT_WITH_CURATIVE_INTENT), AND(HAS_METASTATIC_CANCER, HAS_ANY_STAGE_X[IV])), HAS_PRIMARY_TUMOR_LOCATION_BELONGING_TO_ANY_DOID_TERM_X[Lung non-small cell carcinoma], FUSION_IN_GENE_X[ROS1])
